links.title: Latest News from Nukkleus
links.content:
[![Nukkleus](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/logo.svg)](/)

  * [![LinkedIn](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/social-linkedin.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nukkleus/)
  * [![Twitter](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/themes/nukkleus/assets/images/social-twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/NukkleusInc)



# Nukkleus Latest News

[ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/10.png) 29.12.2023 Nukkleus Inc. shares corporate presentation  A GATEWAY TO THE FUTURE OF FINANCE – 99.3 NUKK FINAL DECK ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-shares-corporate-presentation/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/5.png) 04.05.2022 Nukkleus Inc. completes rebrand to a Blockchain and FinTech business Nukkleus Inc. launches its new website and brand design. Under the new brand and website, the firm’s subsidiary brands will be united under one suite of assets. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-completes-rebrand-to-a-blockchain-and-fintech-business/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/1.png) 23.02.2022 Nukkleus, Inc. to combine with Brilliant Acquisition Corp. Nukkleus, Inc. announces the signing of a merger agreement for a proposed business combination with Brilliant Acquisition Corp, a publicly-traded special purpose acquisition company formed in the British Virgin Islands. The transaction values the Company at an enterprise value of approximately $140 million. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-to-combine-with-brilliant-acquisition-corp/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/2.png) 21.10.2021 Nukkleus Inc. Acquires Stake in New Bitcoin ETF Issuer, Jacobi Asset Management Crypto payments specialist Nukkleus Inc, formally acquires a 5% interest (for an eight figure sum) in Jacobi Asset Management Limited (Jacobi), a company focused on digital asset management that has received regulatory approval to launch the world’s first tier one Bitcoin ETF. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-acquires-stake-in-new-bitcoin-etf-issuer-jacobi-asset-management/) [ ![](https://www.nukk.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/15-1.png) 20.09.2021 Polygon and Nukkleus to support Bollant Industries, revolutioniz-ing municipal waste recycling Crypto payments specialist Nukkleus Inc, will work in collaboration with Polygon and Grassroots Economics to deliver a Blockchain community grant to Bollant Industries in Hyderabad, India. The grant will support the development of a blockchain solution to improve the waste management supply chain. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/polygon-and-nukkleus-to-support-bollant-industries-revolutioniz-ing-municipal-waste-recycling/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) 14.09.2021 Nukkleus announces exclusive partnership with Monogram blockchain to facilitate payments for MG Token Nukkleus Inc. has partnered with Monogram Network, a leading public ledger blockchain, supporting the issuance of their MG Token. This exclusive partnership via crypto firm Digital RFQ Limited is another step forward in providing institutional investors with the security they need to enter the crypto market and benefit from the performance of digital assets and crypto payments. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-announces-exclusive-partnership-with-monogram-blockchain-to-facilitate-payments-for-mg-token/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) 12.07.2021 Nukkleus seeks UK EMI license to expand Crypto-powered service offerings Nukkleus, Inc. is announcing the submission of an application to the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) for an Electronic Money Institution (license). The license, if granted, would enable Nukkleus to provide seamless crypto conversions of regulated fiat money transfers within traditional banking infrastructure. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-seeks-uk-emi-license-to-expand-crypto-powered-service-offerings/) [ ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201350%20650'%3E%3C/svg%3E) 09.06.2021 Nukkleus Inc. acquires London-based Match Financial Limited Nukkleus, Inc, a leading software and technology solutions firm, is proud to announce the acquisition of Match Financial Limited, a London-based financial services firm that wholly owns Digital RFQ Limited. ](https://www.nukk.com/news/nukkleus-inc-acquires-london-based-match-financial-limited/)
